comments:
I use the FigureCanvas for creating a viewPart in the workbench. Here is how it
is used:
public void createPartControl(Composite parent) 
{
        FigureCanvas _canvas= new FigureCanvas(parent);
	_canvas.setScrollBarVisibility(FigureCanvas.AUTOMATIC);
	_panel = new Figure();
	_canvas.setContents(_panel);
 
 
 _contentsLayout = new XYLayout();
 _panel.setLayoutManager(_contentsLayout);
    
}

Everything works fine until I exit from the run-time workbench, at that time,
the workbench dispose() menthod is called, which generates the following
exception. This only appears for eclipse3.0.1+GEF3.0.1, It doesn't have trouble
when I try it for eclipse3.0+GEF3.0
